item.title: Safety Guarantees for Drones through Set-Based Formal Verification Methods
item.description:
1. Build the quadrotor testbed for the team based on Crazyflie drones
  2. Develop a hardware and software in the loop, Gazebo-based swarm simulator for the Crazyflie drones
  3. Investigate safety of dynamical systems through Taylor-based methods and abstract interpretation
  4. On-the-fly, lightweight, real-time verification (reach and safety properties) algorithms to be embedded on the Crazyflie drones

item.title: Human-Embedded Autonomous Flight Under Formal Task Specifications
item.description:
1. Design and build quadrotors based on the Snapdragon Platform with PX4 as the autopilot.
  2. Implementation of a fast trajectory generator for quadrotors based on the minimum snap approach and a new problem modeling to improve stability and speed
  3. Human interface with virtual reality and autonomous flight of a quadrotor via eye-tracking
  4. Tracking of stochastically moving targets using POMDP (Partially Observable Markov Decision Process) and human input
  5. Model checking and planning of UAVs autonomous missions with specifications written in linear temporal logic (LTL)
